biography.summary: Thom Tillis is an American politician and businessman serving as the senior United States Senator from North Carolina. A Republican, he previously served as Speaker of the North Carolina House of Representatives and has been active in business and public service in North Carolina.
biography.career: Businessman and public servant in North Carolina; former Speaker of the North Carolina House of Representatives before being elected to the U.S. Senate.

contact.office_address: 113 Dirksen Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510
